Articles.Content:
I made this as a stupid joke.

And it flies.

KSP, you've taught me how to be the best aeronautical engineer!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/jvewp)

Download: [http://www./download/8iht76qto8oladm/KSP_plz.craft](http://www./download/8iht76qto8oladm/KSP_plz.craft)

It flies surprisingly well, although you have to be a bit careful on banking, and it's decent at gliding. The controls feel a bit floaty though, you may want to add SAS.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-30T05:07:56Z" title="03/30/2015 05:07  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 30, 2015</time> by BaneOfPilots**
